mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SFM_PAYMENT (PAYMENTNUM, PAYMENTWEEK,PAYMENTNAME, MATCHNUM, MEMNUM, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE) VALUES (#{paymentnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{paymentname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.PAYMENTNUM PAYMENTNUM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PAYMENTWEEK), 'DY') PAYMENTWEEK ,A.PAYMENTNAME PAYMENTNAME ,A.MATCHNUM MATCHNUM ,A.MEMNUM MEMNUM ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE FROM SFM_PAYMENT A WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.PAYMENTNUM = #{paymentnum}

SELECT A.PAYMENTNUM PAYMENTNUM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PAYMENTWEEK), 'DY')PAYMENTWEEK ,A.PAYMENTNAME PAYMENTNAME ,A.MATCHNUM MATCHNUM ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD')INSERTDATE ,B.MATCHJIBUNADDRESS MATCHJIBUNADDRESS ,B.MATCHKICKOFF MATCHKICKOFF ,B.MATCHPERSONNEL MATCHPERSONNEL ,B.MATCHGENDER MATCHGENDER ,B.MATCHLV MATCHLV FROM SFM_PAYMENT A, SFM_MATCH B WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND B.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.PAYMENTNUM = #{paymentnum} AND A.MATCHNUM = B.MATCHNUM(+)
